fields.Chapter Title: Building a Psychology Orientation Course: Common Themes and Exercises
fields.Book Title: Best Practices for Teaching Beginnings and Endings in the Psychology Major
fields.Publisher: Best Practices for Teaching Beginnings and Endings in the Psychology Major
fields.Description/Abstract: Psychology is one of the most popular majors in higher education. According to the National Center for Education Statistics, in the latest year data are available (2005-2006), 88,134 students earned psychology bacalaureate degrees in the United States (Synder, Dillow, & Hoffman, 2008). Given that "degrees awarded" represents only those who successfully complete a program, the overall number of psychology undergraduate majors is undoubtedly much higher.
